page.title: 09Events in Whitchurch.
page.content: There are many annual events that take place in Whitchurch.Every year there is a Carnival.There is always a Carnival Queen and Princess picked for this event.There is usually an opening ceremony often held on Lord Denning's lawn when the weather is fine,if not then the event usually takes place at the Whitchurch Centre. There is also a Folk Festival held in the town every year.This is mainly singing but sometimes there have been groups of dancers. During many weeks of the year,especially in the summer you will see adverts about jumble sales,bazaars and sales from the many Societies and clubs that there are in Whitchurch.
